Equipment Actions.Action 1: Unarmed Strike, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Bludgeoning.  The Vampire can grapple a hit target instead of doing damage.  Wait a second, Vampires are people, they can equip weapons, uh oh
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Piercing plus 10 Necrotic, reducing the target's maximum health by the Necrotic damage and healing the Vampire

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Vampire makes 2 attacks, only one of which can be a Bite
Other Actions.Action 2: Charm, The Vampire targets a humanoid it can see and charms them.  A charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend of the highest regard, to be heeded and protected
Other Actions.Action 3: Children of the Night, The Vampire magically calls swarms of bats, rats or wolves and can command them

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Vampire can polymorph into a Tiny Bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form
Abilities.Ability 2: Legendary Resistance, If the Vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead
Abilities.Ability 3: Misty Escape, If the Vampire is defeated, it transforms into a cloud of mist and attempts to return to its resting place to recover
Abilities.Ability 4: Regeneration, The Vampire restores its health every turn.  It is believed that Radiant damage and holy water will prevent the Vampire from healing
Abilities.Ability 5: Spider Climb, The Vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings without needing to make an ability check
Abilities.Ability 6: Vampire Weaknesses, These are mostly from folk tales and should be taken with a grain of salt.  Forbiddance, A vampire can not enter a residence without invitation from an occupant.  Harmed by Running Water, The vampire is affected by running water as if it were acid.  Stake to the Heart, If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while it is resting, it becomes paralyzed.  Sunlight Hypersensitivity, A vampire takes Radiant damage from sunlight, as well as disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Move, The Vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Unarmed Strike, The Vampire makes one unarmed strike
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Bite, The Vampire makes one Bite attack

Lair Actions.Action 1: Honestly, not many who have entered a Vampire's lair have survived to recount their tales, here is what we do know
Lair Actions.Action 2: There is a surge in the population of bats, rats and wolves.  Plants near the lair wither and become twisted and thorny.  Shadows move as if alive.  A creeping fog clings to the ground, taking eerie forms
